ILEX: How strange.. I have arrived on this island to begin my quantum pilgrimage, but there does not appear to be any way into this colossal tower I can see.

ILEX: I can barely see the anchor of a tractor beam high above, which should reasonably be the path to ascend to the top - but it appears to be inactive. Ugh, how troubling.

ILEX: Solanum, I am going to explore this island for clues to a method of entry into the tower and take my mind off things. Please look for me if you have already arrived.

SOLANUM: Ilex, this is why Bells told us to visit her for instructions before departing for Giant's Deep.. You must be less afraid to visit and talk with her!

ILEX: Oh.. I admit, I was feeling a little brash and moody today. A walk along this serene beach has calmed my mind well. Wait - the tractor beam is working now! Were you the one who activated it, Solanum?

5
SOLANUM: Of course. While you were exploring the island, I was launching repeatedly here from Brittle Hollow. I believe I noticed an audience on the <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color> watching me continue to fail to land here precisely..
7
6
SOLANUM: Regardless, I am glad you are feeling better, my friend. Come, let us make haste to the trial! Conoy told me of an exciting <color=orange>secret within the tower</color> I wish to investigate, after both of us have completed the trial...
